text: (melum, avarkalai nokki) niccayamaka allah itait tatai ceytan enru ninkal urutippatuttuvatarkaka unkal catcikalai alaittu varunkal'' enru nir kuruviraka. (Avvaru avarkalai alaittu vantu) avarkalum (avvare poy) catci kuriyapotilum (atarkaka) nirum avarkalutan cerntu (avvaru) catci kuraventam. Melum, nam vacanankal poyyenak kuriyavarkal marrum iruti nalai nampikkai kollatavarkalutaiya mana viruppankalai nir pinparratir. Avarkaltan tankal iraivanukku (palavarrai) inaiyakkukinranar
